SEARCH
Package org.graalvm.polyglot

Annotation Interface HostAccess.Implementable

Enclosing class:
HostAccess
@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) public static @interface HostAccess.Implementable
Allows guest language to implement a Java type. Implementable is required if the explicit host access policy is set. The annotation to use for this purpose can be customized with HostAccess.Builder.allowImplementationsAnnotatedBy(Class). Allowing implementations for all Java interfaces can be enabled with HostAccess.Builder.allowAllImplementations(boolean).
Since:
19.0
See Also:
  • Context.Builder.allowHostAccess(HostAccess)
  • Value.as(Class)
